summary.para: Retrieves the file-name attribute of the <OptionalBundle>.

param.name: fileName
param.para: A string that contains the file name of the package.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves an object that represents the identity of the <OptionalBundle>.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Retrieves optional packages in the bundle.

param.name: packageInfoItems
param.para: An enumerator over all payload packages in a <OptionalBundle> element of a bundle.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Provides a read-only object model for an <OptionalBundle> element in a bundle package manifest.
